measurement.description: The measured output of P that is used for feedback

control_input.description: The control input of the plant

step_input.description: The input to the system when optimizing the step response

step_output.description: The output to the system when optimizing the step response

ref.description: The reference signal for the response optimization

Ms.description: Maximum allowed peak in the sensitivity function

Mt.description: Maximum allowed peak in the complementary sensitivity function

Mks.description: Maximum allowed peak in the noise sensitivity function

kp_lb.description: Lower bound for the proportional gain (kp) in the optimization.

ki_lb.description: Lower bound for the integral gain (ki) in the optimization.

kd_lb.description: Lower bound for the derivative gain (kd) in the optimization.

Tf_lb.description: Lower bound for the filter time constant (Tf) in the optimization.

kp_ub.description: Upper bound for the proportional gain (kp) in the optimization.

ki_ub.description: Upper bound for the integral gain (ki) in the optimization.

kd_ub.description: Upper bound for the derivative gain (kd) in the optimization.

Tf_ub.description: Upper bound for the filter time constant (Tf) in the optimization.

kp_guess.description: Initial guess for the proportional gain (kp) in the optimization.

ki_guess.description: Initial guess for the integral gain (ki) in the optimization.

kd_guess.description: Initial guess for the derivative gain (kd) in the optimization.

Tf_guess.description: Initial guess for the filter time constant (Tf) in the optimization.

timeweight.description: If true, time-weighted error is used as the cost function.

filter_order.description: The order of the filter. Options are {1, 2}.

optimize_d.description: If true, the filter damping ratio is optimized.

wl.description: Lower bound for the frequency vector (w) in the optimization. Use -1 for automatic selection.

wu.description: Upper bound for the frequency vector (w) in the optimization. Use -1 for automatic selection.

num_frequencies.description: Number of frequencies to include in w.
